mainHero.subtitle: Biomedical Engineering Club.
mainHero.description: The  Biomedical Engineering Club is dedicated to fostering a community of aspiring biomedical engineers at Concordia University. Our mission is to explore innovative solutions that bridge engineering and healthcare, preparing members for careers in this dynamic field.

items.title: AI Dermatology Diagnostic Tool
items.description: A clinical decision-support system designed to assist healthcare professionals in making faster and more accurate preliminary dermatological diagnoses. This project combines a powerful visual analysis CNN with a symptom analysis engine to provide comprehensive, evidence-based differential diagnosis, covering over 320 conditions with CNN trained on 23 common visual classes.

items.title: Student Research Opportunities
items.description: Get involved in cutting-edge research projects with faculty mentors. Our club connects students with research opportunities in medical imaging, biosensors, rehabilitation engineering, and computational biology. Build your portfolio while contributing to meaningful healthcare innovations.

features.title: Our Goals
features.subtitle: Unlocking the Future of Biomedical Engineering!
features.description: At our Biomedical Engineering Club, we strive to foster an environment where innovation meets collaboration. Our mission is to empower members with the skills, resources, and connections necessary to excel in the field of biomedical engineering. Here’s how we aim to achieve our goals:

items.name: Education
items.description: Provide resources and workshops to enhance members’ technical skills and knowledge in biomedical engineering.

items.name: Collaboration
items.description: Facilitate interdisciplinary teamwork through projects and events, encouraging collaboration between engineering, health sciences, and other related fields.

items.name: Networking
items.description: Connect students with industry professionals, alumni, and faculty to build valuable relationships and mentorship opportunities.

items.name: Innovation
items.description: Promote creative thinking and problem-solving through hands-on projects and competitions, encouraging members to develop their own ideas and solutions in the biomedical engineering space.

pricing.title: Meet Our Team
pricing.subtitle: The passionate individuals driving innovation in biomedical engineering

items.name: Executive Team
items.description: Our dedicated executive team leads the club's initiatives and coordinates activities.
features: Join our executive team and lead innovation in biomedical engineering
Help coordinate workshops and project development

items.name: Join Our Projects
items.description: Get hands-on experience working on cutting-edge biomedical engineering projects.

events.title: Upcoming Events & Activities
events.subtitle: Join us for workshops, project showcases, and networking opportunities

items.name: Weekly Workshops
items.description: Learn new skills in AI, medical device design, and biomedical data analysis.

items.name: Project Showcase
items.description: Present your projects and see what other members are working on.

items.name: Industry Guest Speakers
items.description: Network with professionals from leading biomedical companies and research institutions.

sections.name: Meeting Times
sections.content: Weekly meetings every Friday at 5:00 PM in the EV Building. All students welcome!

sections.name: Get Involved
sections.content: Whether you're interested in AI applications in medicine, medical device design, or healthcare data analysis, our club offers opportunities to learn, contribute, and make a real impact. We welcome students from all engineering disciplines and backgrounds.

sections.name: Partnership Opportunities
sections.content: Industry professionals and healthcare organizations interested in collaborating on student projects or providing mentorship opportunities are encouraged to reach out to us.
